BACK.NAME: Back
BACK.DESC: Move X lanes away from the target. If the target is in the same lane, move towards the closest arena edge.

CANNOT_REACT.NAME: Cannot React
CANNOT_REACT.DESC: This ability cannot be used to react to an incoming clashable enemy attack.

DEVIOUS.NAME: Devious
DEVIOUS.DESC: If this ability is activated when it is your turn, the target cannot clash against it.

FINAL.NAME: Final
FINAL.DESC: Activating this ability removes all of the user's remaining actions this round.

FIXED_COOLDOWN.NAME: Fixed Cooldown
FIXED_COOLDOWN.DESC: This ability's cooldown cannot be reduced or reset by other abilities or passives.

FORWARD.NAME: Forward
FORWARD.DESC: Move X lanes towards the target (but not past the target).

INVIGORATE.NAME: Invigorate
INVIGORATE.DESC: Invigorated abilities have their cooldown reduced by X rounds.

PULL.NAME: Pull
PULL.DESC: Pulled units move X lanes towards the puller (but not past the puller).

PUSH.NAME: Push
PUSH.DESC: Pushed units move X lanes away from the pusher. If the target is in the same lane, move towards the center of the arena.

REVITALIZE.NAME: Revitalize
REVITALIZE.DESC: Revitalized abilities have their cooldown reset.
